news_header: A ski lift failure in the Spanish Pyrenees injured at least 10 people, with eyewitnesses describing chaotic scenes.
news_text: Eyewitnesses reported a ski lift failure in the Spanish Pyrenees that resulted in at least 10 injuries. One boy described the scene as people 'flying and pirouetting' when the chair began to bounce. Emergency services transported the injured to hospitals, while the cause of the failure remains unknown.
